description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

The Google Customer Solutions (GCS) Insights team powers Google’s GCS Revenue organization. We deliver actionable business intelligence and insights at scale, through cross-functional analytical investigations that shape how we serve Google's small and mid-market clients.

As a Sales Analytics and Insights Lead within the Sales Analytics and Solutions (SaS) Insights team, you will partner with our Sales stakeholders on their insights and business intelligence needs. You will use an analytical, data-driven approach to drive a deep understanding of our fast changing business, provide insights that will translate directly to accelerated business growth, and improve the ability of the overall GCS organization to operate at scale while simultaneously delighting its customers. Additionally, you will partner with Sales teams to identify the insights and intelligence they require to understand, manage, and grow their business and develop solutions to deliver their requirements at scale. In this ole, you will also provide analytical thought leadership to our leaders, delivering insights that enable them to make sound decisions about where to invest Product, Sales, and Marketing efforts, covering new advertiser acquisitions, existing account growth, and partner strategies for our small and mid-market client base.

Sales Operations is the global team that makes sure Google's complex and ever-evolving business runs smoothly. Experts in leading process improvements and consistency, team members are analytical and strategic with a pragmatic sense of how to get things done. They develop global initiatives and set high-level goals to improve productivity.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Finance, Mathematics, Statistics, related field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • 4 years of experience in management consulting, financial analysis, sales analytics, or an equivalent analyst position.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA or Master's degree
  • Experience with statistical tools (e.g., R, SPSS, Python, MATLAB) or creating dashboards (e.g.,Tableau or similar visualization tools).
  • Experience manipulating data and generating insights using SQL.
  • Ability to translate complex findings in a structured and clear manner to a non-technical audience and excellent communication skills.
  • Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced, cross-functional, and fast-changing environment.
  • Passion for utilizing insights to drive business decisions at all levels of the organization.
responsibilities:
• Develop an in-depth understanding of the drivers of growth and sales performance for a major global program.
  • Provide leaders with deep, compelling insights about the health and efficiency of their business and key opportunities for growth.
  • Design and develop dashboards to provide insights at scale.
  • Engage closely with Engineering and Business Intelligence partner teams to influence and guide their development roadmaps.
  • Identify opportunities to apply advanced statistical methods to business challenges.
title: Sales Analytics and Insights Lead, Google Customer Solutions
